alert.note: Alert for Daniels; Northern Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 9:58PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Daniels and northern Valley Counties through 1100 PM MDT... At 958 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 26 miles west of Opheim, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Opheim, Richland, Port Of Opheim, Thoeny, Baylor and Glentana. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
